question: 友人
sourceMnemonic: A person who is a friend is just that, a <vocabulary>friend</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. Since <ja>人</ja> has two on'yomi readings, here's a mnemonic to help you remember which one to use:

All your <vocabulary>friend</vocabulary>s are <reading>you</reading>ths in <reading>jean</reading>s (<ja>ゆうじん</ja>)! Every single one. If any of your friends is not a youth in jeans, they're simply not your friend, I'm afraid.
